metadata.title: CVE-2020-24616 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.10.6 mishandles the interaction between serialization gadgets and typing, related to br.com.anteros.dbcp.AnterosDBCPDataSource (aka Anteros-DBCP).

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
